original_title: Bee Gees: Live! One For All
overview: Recorded live in Melbourne, Australia, at the National Tennis Centre in November 1989, this concert film captures the Bee Gees’ “One for All World Tour,” celebrating their eighteenth studio album One. This fully restored, newly mixed and mastered show features the Gibb brothers performing tracks from as far back as their 1966 breakthrough hit “Spicks and Specks” as well as their classic seventies and eighties songs.
title: Bee Gees: Live! One For All
